title: Chain, 1840–60
dimensions: Overall approx: 122 x 0.5 cm (48 1/16 x 3/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Gustav E. Kissel
description: Chain composed of links made of human hair (three links of brown hair alternating with three of white).

tombstone.epitaph:
Chain, 1840–60.
1840–60. Hair. Gift of Mrs. Gustav E. Kissel. 1928-5-17.
